title: Aatmatrisha
content: What are the timings for aatmatrisha pro nite concert and comedy show ?? I have heard that pronite ends at 2am . Is it correct?? Are comedy nite and pro nite  on the same day ??

comments.body:

It usually starts around 5pm and goes till 10pm
